title: right-facing fist: medium-dark skin tone

nouns: The raised fist is a symbol of solidarity and support.
Hand with the fingers curled into the palm
The closed hand with the fingers on the palm.
A fist is an action where a hand has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles.
A hand that has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles
Hand with the fingers clenched or curled inward
A hand with the fingers clenched in the palm (as for hitting)

description: This version of the  Right-facing Fist emoji has the  Medium-dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Dark Brown Skin Tone on sup
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the right-facing fist emoji with a medium-dark skin tone is depicted with powerful simplicity, its knuckles clearly defined and its form solid and resolute.  Apple's signature glossy finish and realistic lighting lend a subtle sheen to the skin, highlighting the rounded, tactile quality of the fist.  This emoji powerfully conveys solidarity, support, agreement, or a strong affirmation, often used to show encouragement or a shared sense of purpose.
